StuffTheSpire:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

StuffTheSpire:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
StuffTheSpire:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

StuffTheSpire:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

StuffTheSpire:NeowsTribute.NAME: Neows Tribute
StuffTheSpire:NeowsTribute.FLAVOR: It is said, that Neow rewards those who have archieved great things.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click during Combat: Consume 1 Charge to gain 1 Intangible. Defeat Elites to gain Charges.

StuffTheSpire:RunicHypercube.NAME: Runic Hypercube
StuffTheSpire:RunicHypercube.FLAVOR: It seems to shift in size and shape. Strange.
DESCRIPTIONS: After the first turn of combat gain 3 [E] and draw 5 additional cards at the start of each turn. NL At the end of your turn count the total cost of all cards in your hand. NL Loose that much [e] and draw fewer cards equal to the total cost next turn.

StuffTheSpire:Mouthbags.NAME: Mouthbags
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup choose a card and increase it's damage and block by 2.

StuffTheSpire:CocoNut.NAME: Coconut
StuffTheSpire:CocoNut.FLAVOR: If you eat to much you'll get very fat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup gain 5 max HP. At the start of each combat gain 1 Juggernaut.
